column2: Is your trusted high-secure Bitcoin Mixer BTC JAWW Is your trusted high secure personal Bitcoin Mixer See More Validater What do we do We combine payments from multiple users making it near impossible to know which Bitcoin addresses were used Ultimately your coins are returned to you almost as clean as the day they were mined We at BTC JAWW use a brand new technology to proceed extended encrypted mixing When you use BTC JAWW to mix your Bitcoins you will receive Bitcoins that originate from lots and lots of different transactions and wallet addresses making it almost impossible for someone to track your wallet activity Trusted by our partners How it works Please send your Bitcoins to the following Wallet address 1oQ6nBrEeJNCAYRcUk19SoUuUGSp8DiA5 Click here if you want another Wallet receiving your BTC Reserve 788 0407 BTC Note that the minimum amount is 0 1 BTC Mixing time We wait for 6 network confirmations on all deposits to prevent double spending from 1 to 24 hours Our Fees The service takes 0 1 5 BTC 0 75 5 10 BTC 0 5 10 100 BTC 0 25 Our Tips 1 Use Tor Browser for staying anonymous 2 You don t have to send your Bitcoins to BCT JAWW from the same address as your destination address By using different addresses your Bitcoin transactions will be virtually impossible to trace Finally You can sit back and relax while your Bitcoins are safely mixed Pay special attention to FAQ We complied the most popular client questions and answered them If you have any questions or concerns feel free to contact us Copyright 2014 2018 BTC JAWW All Rights Reserved
